Author: Clarence Lam
game.name: That's not latin...

game.description:
I hid a flag somewhere on this site. Find it.

Author: Clarence Lam

_hints.hint:
About 75% of internet users have already done the first step to this.
There is another, more standard way, but that's boring.

game.name: Ads

game.description:
ctong610 is trying to write a program, but he's really bad at programming so his program has both syntax errors and is way too long. If he has 10^4 pairs of parentheses, in how many ways can they be organized validly? (Note: (()()) is valid, but (()()( is not).

Give your answer as a number mod 10^3.

Note: ^ in this case is exponentiation, not xor.

The flag is just a number.

Author: Chris Tong
game.name: Not Lisp

game.description:
Everybody loves LSD!

Authors: Kevin Higgs, Chris Tong

_hints.hint: What did you think I meant?

game.name: Not Quite LSD

game.description:
oh no it's rsa

Author: Clarence Lam

_hints.hint: Something seems funny about that modulus.

game.description:
krnh12 tried to send me this image, but darn kmh11 intercepted it and twirled it around.  Can you help me recover the flag?

UPDATE: The flag has been changed, but no solves have been lost. Use the new file, twirl.jpg.

Author: Clarence Lam

_hints.hint: What's the opposite of twirl?

game.name: Twirl

game.description:
lel i haz good meme

Author: Kevin Higgs

_hints.hint: This hint is useless, along with everything else. Except for the file.

game.name: Woah!

game.description: Make the server give you the flag. Navigate to the problem page from here. Secondary instance (slightly different, but same solution) running at 52.90.229.46:2233. Author: Steven Su

_hints.hint: I don't think you get it.

game.name: Methods

game.description: The bot flagbotbot on #tpctf-chal has a flag, but has only a 3% chance of giving it out. The other 97% of the time, it gives out flegs. Flegs look like flags. Don't get fooled by flegs. You can get flagbotbot talking by waiting 30 seconds. Author: Clarence Lam

_hints.hint: There isn't a good way to solve this other than staring at the chat box for a while. If you don't want to do that, get someone else to do it. Or something else, for that matter.

game.name: IRC

you found this strange string on the floor
"""1rMrhv9mEAWBU99vE0QIIBN6qavpGvkczWDsiMtJRf3Y"""

Author: Clarence Lam

_hints.hint: What kind of string is it?
I'm sure Google is behind some of this.

game.name: Secret Doc

game.name: Public key? What about no key?

game.description:
My friend sent me a flag encrypted with an encryption program. Unfortunately, the decryption doesn't seem to work. Please help me decrypt this: dufhyuc>bi{{f0|;vwh<~b5p5thjq6goj}

Author: Kevin Higgs
game.name: Super Encryption!

game.description: krnh11 made a program, but now he's kinda lost. https://repl.it/IiUz/ Author: Clarence Lam

_hints.hint: Where is it?

game.name: What is this place?

game.description: I've created a new website so you can do all your important management. It includes users, creating things, reading things, and... well, not much else. Maybe there's a flag? Second instance running at 52.90.229.46:8558 tpctf{san1t1z3_y0ur_1npu7s} is not the correct flag. Look harder ;) Note: the flag format is flag{}, not the usual tpctf{} Author: Kevin Higgs

_hints.hint: Those names seem interesting...

game.name: Management

game.description: My thumb's getting tired, but I'll type this last problem. I found a cool video. I also found an encrypted file. Oh well, I have to go clip my finger nails now. Author: Kevin Higgs

_hints.hint: Either I rick rolled you, or there's a flag somewhere. Also, I have a really big thumb.

game.name: Rick

game.description:
It's sorta random.

Author: Clarence Lam

_hints.hint: The text file is not the only thing attached.

game.name: Sorta

game.description:
My friend told me there was a flag in here.  Help me find it.
Note: The flag does not follow the tpctf{flag} format.  Also, it is recommended to turn off line wrapping in your text editor.
Also, don't worry about case. The flag is case-insensitive.

Author: Steven Su

_hints.hint: EVERYTHING you are given will help you solve this challenge. Again, pay attention to everything you are given!

game.name: Word Find

game.description:
Ajax sure has a lot to say.

Author: Clarence Lam

_hints.hint: The flag may not be what you think it is. Also, the flag may be what you think it isn't. You are nothing.
angle brackets don't always mean html

game.name: You are nothing

game.description:
kmh12 was scared of hekkermen stealing his flags, so he encrypted them. Unfortunately, he was struck with malware and all his _files were encrypted. Luckily, he backed up his encrypted flag, 45531566522752268234207465413786679228772310050424518387695752654841326765465, but he was unable to recover any of his _files. Can you help him?

Note: The one time pad uses xor.

UPDATED with new _files, should now be solvable.

Author: Kevin Higgs

_hints.hint:
Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn.
Maybe this has to do with one of the _files?

game.name: Lost Flag

game.description:
krnh11 sent me this demo file thing and I can't seem to figure out what it means.

Author: Clarence Lam
game.name: Demo File

game.description:
I was making an encryption program, but it is far from perfect. Instead of make the encryption work, I decided to just encrypt everything 100 times.

Author: Kevin Higgs

_hints.hint: I bet the encryption works at least most of the time.

game.name: Bad Encryption

game.description: Common Sense Reviews was fixed last night. If you believe you had a working sol. last night but did not receive an email, please retry that solution. One major issue was email sending. We found this site: Common Sense Reviews We think the site owners are related to Pirates. Please retrieve the admin password. This challenge is not working right now, it should be back soon. If not, we will remove points received from it.This challenge should be working properly now. Expect a delay in receiving emails (approx. 3 minutes max?). Author: Steven Su
game.name: It's Common Sense

game.description:
A friend of mine wrote his own custom encryption and challenged me to break it. I can't even get past the source code though...

Author: Clarence Lam
game.name: I need better friends
